question: New Jalpaiguri, which was seen in news recently, is located in which state?
explanation:
To mark the 50th anniversary of the liberation of Bangladesh, a new passenger train service between Dhaka and New Jalpaiguri is set to commence this month.
The direct train between Dhaka and New Jalpaiguri will run through the Chilahati-Haldibari cross border rail route. New Jalpaiguri station is the largest railway station of the Northeast Frontier Railway zone.
